data.name: CINEVR
data.description:
PUBLIC SCREENINGS
Each week, 4 movies in theaters (2D and 3D) every evening at 9 p.m CET.

60+ PREMIUM MOVIES ON DEMAND
Explore the largest catalog of movies on demand in virtual reality! +60 movies are available in 2D and 3D, most of them in several languages and with subtitles.

AMAZING IMAGE QUALITY AND SPATIALIZED AUDIO
Movies on demand are encoded by us in 1080p with a very high bitrate to offer the best image quality in VR.
All our environments surround you with spatialized 360Â° sound.

SOCIAL AND CROSS PLATFORM
Create or join private/public rooms to watch movies and videos with up to 9 people regardless of your VR headset.
Send emojis and chat to interact with your friends and other people.

LOCAL VIDEOS
Play videos from your computer or your home network (SMB). Audio tracks and subtitles are automatically recognized by our player.

THEMATIC SCENES
Personalize your experience with our 6 thematic scenes (movie theater, beach, drive-in, haunted house, spaceship and antic theater).
